summary: This document is an authorization form from Deutsche Bank Wealth Management, allowing an agent to buy, sell, and trade securities on behalf of the undersigned. It outlines the responsibilities and indemnities associated with such transactions, emphasizing that the authorization remains in effect until revoked by the undersigned.
keyFacts: The document is an authorization for trading securities by an agent on behalf of the undersigned.
It includes indemnity clauses protecting Deutsche Bank from losses incurred during transactions.
The authorization is a continuing one, remaining effective until revoked in writing.
The document mentions Deutsche Bank Securities Inc. as the entity conducting securities activities.
There are references to the confidentiality of the document under federal rules.
